headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://apis.google.com https://www.gstatic.com https://*.firebasedatabase.app; connect-src 'self' https://*.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.firebasedatabase.app wss://*.firebaseio.com wss://*.firebasedatabase.app https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com https://securetoken.googleapis.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.firebaseapp.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:;
